verses.verse: The hand<WH3027> of the Lord<WH3068> was upon me<WH3318>, and carried me out in the spirit<WH7307> of the Lord<WH3068>, and set me down<WH5117> in the midst<WH8432> of the valley<WH1237> which was full<WH4392> of bones<WH6106>,
And caused me to pass<WH5674> by them round about<WH5439>: and<WH3966>, behold, there were very many<WH7227> in the open<WH6440> valley<WH1237>; and<WH3966>, behold, they were very dry<WH3002>.
And he said<WH559> unto me<WH1121>, Son of man<WH120>, can these bones<WH6106> live<WH2421>? And I answered<WH559>, O Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>, you know<WH3045>.
Again he said<WH559> unto me<WH5012>, Prophesy upon these bones<WH6106>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH3002>, O you dry bones<WH6106>, hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068>.
Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069> unto these bones<WH6106>; Behold<WH7307>, I will cause breath to enter<WH935> into you<WH2421>, and you shall live:

And I will lay<WH5414> sinews<WH1517> upon you<WH5927>, and will bring up flesh<WH1320> upon you<WH7159>, and cover you with skin<WH5785>, and put<WH5414> breath<WH7307> in you<WH2421>, and you shall live; and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068>.

So I prophesied<WH5012> as I was commanded<WH6680>: and as I prophesied<WH5012>, there was a noise<WH6963>, and behold a shaking<WH7494>, and the bones<WH6106> came together<WH7126>, bone<WH6106> to his bone<WH6106>.

And when I looked<WH7200>, behold<WH1517>, the sinews and the flesh<WH1320> came up<WH5927> upon them<WH5785>, and the skin covered<WH7159> them above<WH4605>: but there was no breath in them<WH7307>.

Then said<WH559> he unto me<WH5012>, Prophesy unto the wind<WH7307>, prophesy<WH5012>, son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, and say<WH559> to the wind<WH7307>, Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Come<WH935> from the four<WH702> winds<WH7307>, O breath<WH7307>, and breathe<WH5301> upon these slain<WH2026>, that they may live<WH2421>.

So I prophesied<WH5012> as he commanded<WH6680> me<WH7307>, and the breath came<WH935> into them<WH2421>, and they lived, and stood up<WH5975> upon their feet<WH7272>, a exceedingly<WH3966> great<WH1419> army<WH2428>.

Then he said<WH559> unto me<WH1121>, Son of man<WH120>, these bones<WH6106> are the whole house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: behold<WH559>, they say, Our bones<WH6106> are dried<WH3001>, and our hope<WH8615> is lost<WH6>: we are cut off for our parts<WH1504>.

Therefore prophesy<WH5012> and say<WH559> unto them<WH559>, Thus says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Behold<WH5971>, O my people, I will open<WH6605> your graves<WH6913>, and cause you to come up<WH5927> out of your graves<WH6913>, and bring<WH935> you into the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>.
And you shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068>, when I have opened<WH6605> your graves<WH6913>, O my people<WH5971>, and brought you up<WH5927> out of your graves<WH6913>,

And shall put<WH5414> my spirit<WH7307> in you<WH2421>, and you shall live, and I shall place<WH3240> you in your own land<WH127>: then shall you know<WH3045> that I the Lord<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it<WH6213>, and performed it<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH3068>.
The word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came again unto me<WH559>, saying,

Moreover<WH1121>, you son of man<WH120>, take<WH3947> you one<WH259> stick<WH6086>, and write<WH3789> upon it<WH3063>, For Judah, and for the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> his companions<WH2270>: then take<WH3947> another<WH259> stick<WH6086>, and write<WH3789> upon it<WH3130>, For Joseph, the stick<WH6086> of Ephraim<WH669>, and for all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> his companions<WH2270>:
And join<WH7126> them one<WH259> to another<WH259> into one<WH259> stick<WH6086>; and they shall become one<WH259> in your hand<WH3027>.
And when the sons<WH1121> of your people<WH5971> shall speak<WH559> unto you<WH559>, saying, Will you not show us what you mean by these<WH5046>?

Say<WH1696> unto them<WH559>, Thus says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Behold<WH3947>, I will take the stick<WH6086> of Joseph<WH3130>, which is in the hand<WH3027> of Ephraim<WH669>, and the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> his fellows<WH2270>, and will put<WH5414> them with him<WH6086>, even with the stick of Judah<WH3063>, and make<WH6213> them one<WH259> stick<WH6086>, and they shall be one<WH259> in my hand<WH3027>.
And the sticks<WH6086> whereon you write<WH3789> shall be in your hand<WH3027> before their eyes<WH5869>.

And say<WH1696> unto them<WH559>, Thus says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; Behold<WH3947>, I will take the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from among<WH996> the heathen<WH1471>, where they be gone<WH1980>, and will gather<WH6908> them on every side<WH5439>, and bring<WH935> them into their own land<WH127>:

And I will make<WH6213> them one<WH259> nation<WH1471> in the land<WH776> upon the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>; and one<WH259> king<WH4428> shall be king<WH4428> to them all<WH5750>: and they shall be no more two<WH8147> nations<WH1471>, neither shall they be divided<WH2673> into two<WH8147> kingdoms any more at all<WH4467>:

Neither shall they defile<WH2930> themselves any more with their idols<WH1544>, nor with their detestable things<WH8251>, nor with any of their transgressions<WH6588>: but I will save<WH3467> them out of all their dwellingplaces<WH4186>, where they have sinned<WH2398>, and will cleanse<WH2891> them<WH5971>: so shall they be my people, and I will be their God<WH430>.

And David<WH1732> my servant<WH5650> shall be king<WH4428> over them<WH259>; and they all shall have one shepherd<WH7462>: they shall also walk<WH3212> in my judgments<WH4941>, and observe<WH8104> my statutes<WH2708>, and do them<WH6213>.

And they shall live<WH3427> in the land<WH776> that I have given<WH5414> unto Jacob<WH3290> my servant<WH5650>, where your fathers<WH1> have lived<WH3427>; and they shall live<WH3427> in it<WH1121>, even they, and their sons, and their children<WH1121>'s sons<WH1121> for ever<WH5769>: and my servant<WH5650> David<WH1732> shall be their prince<WH5387> for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>.

Moreover I will make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> of peace<WH7965> with them<WH5769>; it shall be a everlasting covenant<WH1285> with them<WH5414>: and I will place them<WH7235>, and multiply them<WH5414>, and will set my sanctuary<WH4720> in the midst<WH8432> of them for evermore<WH5769>.
My tabernacle<WH4908> also shall be with them<WH430>: Yes, I will be their God, and they shall be my people<WH5971>.
And the heathen<WH1471> shall know<WH3045> that I the Lord<WH3068> do sanctify<WH6942> Israel<WH3478>, when my sanctuary<WH4720> shall be in the midst<WH8432> of them for evermore<WH5769>.
